result.title: User scenario definition
result.description: The gathered requirements will be used for a visual users scenario model, to be used for a modularized approach to development during the duration of the project. The scenario will take into account options to add, refine, re-calibrate key technology components of the project. The intention is to to provide clear guidance for the scope, technical requirements as well as features of the CPN platform.

result.title: Content Right and distribution framework
result.description: The deliverable will collect and define the legal implications, with specific focus on content rights and distribution. Moreover this deliverable will focus on: a. Ontology Research & Impl /Creating an extensible ontology & distributed platform that allows for adherence to EU copyright and licensing laws and regulations), b. Smart contract network & platform, c. integration of and creation of smart contracts to handle purchase & licensing
